name: RE:Calibur
description:
Downloaded version is recommended for a smoother experience

It has been 1000 years since the Demon Lord was defeated by the Hero of Light. But after a millennium of peace, the threat of the Demon Lord’s resurrection is afoot.

Hitch, a young rookie hero, finds a sentient sword passed down in her family: the former weapon of the Hero of Light! Despite Hitch being novice, the weapon offers her great power to defeat her foes.

"Power me up, and we together will gain the strength to stop the Demon Lord..."

Can she overcome her weaknesses to stop the evil brewing in this kingdom?

Made for the Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth.

Keyboard:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Select: Z
  • Cancel: X
  • Attack: X
  • Strafe: Shift
  • Glasses: C
  • Menu: Esc or Tab

Controller:

  • Movement: D-pad or L stick
  • Select: A
  • Cancel: B
  • Attack: B
  • Strafe: RB or LB
  • Glasses: X
  • Menu: Y
